short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control YouTube ad volume from a popup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you know what's more annoying than an ad? A loud ad. With the YouTube Ad Volume Controller extension, you can adjust the volume of ads to your preferred level. Once the ad is over, the normal volume kicks back in automatically.

Github repository:
https://github.com/alberthashani/youtube-ad-volume-controller
